course_title: Studies in African American Literature: 1900 to Present: AfAm.Literature & Pop. Culture
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 5 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
course_description: A topics course dealing with major traditions and issues in African American literature from 1900 to the present. Possible topics include passing and miscegenation, black novels since 1950, Afrofuturism, and black theater.
sections: Class Nbr: 4121, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: V. Babb, Status: Wait List
